newsitem.title: USA: E-Z Serve names Callahan-Guion pres, COO.
newsitem.headline: E-Z Serve names Callahan-Guion pres, COO.

text.p: E-Z Serve Corp Monday said it named Kathleen Callahan-Guion president and chief operating officer, a new position at the company.
Callahan-Guion was most recently vice president of Southland Corp 's Chesapeake Division.
E-Z Serve operates 702 convenience stores, 10 franchises and distributes motor fuels through 189 non-company operated retail outlets in 20 states, predominantly in the Sunbelt.
